name: 劉益宏
objective:
導論及AI之工業應用、類神經網路及專家系統搜尋法則、敘述邏輯、驗證、機器學習。
Introduction of AI in industrial applications, Neural Networks, Searching algorithm of expert systems, Statement logic, Testing, Machine learning.
schedule:
Part 1: 背景知識簡介 by 投影片 (2 weeks)
Part 2: 機器學習演算法 (Machine Learning algorithms) by 筆記
1.　　多類別分類(multi-class classification) (3 weeks)
2.　　參數最佳化與性能評估 (parameter optimization) (1 week)
3.　　單類別分類 (one-class classification) (2 weeks)
4.　　特徵選擇 (feature selection) (1 week)
期中考 1 week
5.　　維度縮減 (dimension reduction) (1 week)
Part 3: 深度學習 (Deep Learning) by 投影片
1.　　感知機與倒傳遞學習演算法 (2 weeks)
2.　　深度神經網路 (deep neural networks, DNN) (2 weeks)
3.　　卷積神經網路 (convolutional neural networks, CNN) (2 weeks)
期末考 1 week
scorePolicy:
1. 期中考: 30% (part 1 to part 2-4)
2. 期末考: 20% (part 2-5 to part 3 : 考前會指定方向)
3. Matlab程式作業: 30%。共五個程式作業，各6%。
4. 期末論文閱讀報告: 10%。期末2~3人為一組。
5. 演講報告: 5%。
6. 課堂互動表現: 5%
